item.title: 美国政府关门：美国政府关门：如何影响关键经济数据的发布
item.description: 由于共和党和民主党未能达成协议，将拨款延长至 9 月 30 日联邦财政年度结束之后，美国政府于 10 月 1 日关闭了大部分业务。【原文：The U.S. government shut down much of its operations on October 1 after Republicans and Democrats failed to reach an agreement to extend funding past the end of the federal fiscal year on September 30.】

item.title: 阿迪达斯上调全年利润展望，因其部分减轻了美国关税影响
item.description: 德国阿迪达斯周二上调了全年运营利润指导，称已成功减轻了美国提高关税造成的部分额外成本。【原文：Germany's Adidas on Tuesday raised its operating profit guidance for the full year, saying it successfully mitigated part of the extra costs caused by higher U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: Worldline 收窄盈利预期，预示未来将有更多交易
item.description: 周二，Worldline 收窄了 2025 年的利润预期，并表示在未来几周内将进行更多处置，因为这家法国数字支付公司正在努力恢复投资者对其治理受挫和客户流失后的信心。【原文：Worldline narrowed its 2025 profit forecast on Tuesday and signaled more disposals in the coming weeks, as the French digital payments company battles to restore investor confidence following governance setbacks and client losses.】

item.title: 以色列 OurCrowd 创始人梅德维德辞去首席执行官职务，转任董事长
item.description: 以色列 OurCrowd 投资平台创始人乔恩-梅德维德（Jon Medved）周二表示，他将辞去公司首席执行官一职，并将担任公司董事长，理由是身体原因。【原文：Jon Medved, the founder of Israel's OurCrowd investment platform, is stepping down as chief executive officer and will become chairman, the company said on Tuesday, citing medical reasons.】

item.title: 星链（Starlink）的竞争对手欧洲通信卫星公司（Eutelsat）第一季度因视频销售疲软而受到打击
item.description: 法国卫星运营商欧洲通信卫星公司（Eutelsat）周二公布的第一季度收入低于预期，原因是其视频业务销售额的下降抵消了政府服务的强劲需求，尤其是乌克兰的需求。【原文：French satellite operator Eutelsat reported worse-than-expected first quarter revenues on Tuesday as a decline in sales at its video business offset strong demand for government services, notably in Ukraine.】

item.title: 乌克兰和中东冲突推动美国军火制造商利润增长
item.description: 武器制造商洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin）和 RTX 公司周二预测，今年下半年将实现强劲盈利，因为中东冲突和旷日持久的俄乌战争导致武器需求激增，这将使它们的业绩受益匪浅。【原文：Weapons makers Lockheed Martin and RTX predicted strong profits for the rest of this year on Tuesday as their results benefited from surging demand for arms from conflicts in the Middle East and a protracted Russia-Ukraine war.】

item.title: 全球投资者暂时看好焕然一新的日本政府
item.description: 受日本新一届通货再膨胀主义政府承诺的吸引，以及从价格较高的美国和欧洲市场分散投资的愿望，全球资金经理们正重新回到日本的股票和债务市场。【原文：Global money managers are circling back to Japan's stock and debt markets, drawn by the promises of its new reflationist government and a desire to diversify from pricier U.S. and European markets.】

item.title: 尼日利亚金融科技巨头 Moniepoint 融资 2 亿美元拓展数字服务
item.description: 尼日利亚金融科技公司Moniepoint Inc.周二表示，该公司在一轮由国际发展伙伴（Development Partners International）领投的融资中筹集了超过2亿美元的资金，旨在将其数字金融服务扩展到非洲及其他地区。【原文：Nigerian fintech firm Moniepoint Inc. said on Tuesday it had raised more than $200 million in a funding round led by Development Partners International, as it seeks to expand its digital financial services across Africa and beyond.】

item.title: 欧洲芯片制造商 Axelera 推出第二款人工智能推理芯片
item.description: Axelera AI 是欧洲为数不多的为人工智能应用制造专用计算机芯片的公司之一，该公司周二表示将推出第二条产品线。【原文：Axelera AI, one of the few companies in Europe making specialized computer chips for AI applications, on Tuesday said it will launch its second product line.】

item.title: 阿根廷 8 月经济活动增长放缓至 2.5
item.description: 路透社周二对分析师进行的一项调查显示，阿根廷 8 月份的经济活动增长可能连续第二个月放缓。【原文：Argentina's economic activity growth likely slowed for a second consecutive month in August, a Reuters poll of analysts showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧莱雅斥资 47 亿美元收购开云集团旗下美妆品牌，带来数十年发展潜力
item.description: 欧莱雅斥资 47 亿美元从开云集团（Kering）收购化妆品和香水品牌的交易，使这家法国企业集团获得了包括古驰（Gucci）在内的罕见的 50 年特许经营权，这很可能会巩固其在美容行业日益增长的市场份额中的主导地位。【原文：L'Oreal's $4.7 billion deal to buy cosmetic and fragrance brands from Kering gives the French conglomerate rare 50-year licences, including for Gucci, that are likely to confirm its dominance in a growing part of the beauty sector.】

item.title: 汽车制造商与电动汽车制造商联手避免欧盟排放罚款
item.description: 汽车制造商已结成联盟，通过购买电动汽车公司的信用额度，帮助他们避免欧盟对碳排放的巨额罚款。【原文：Automakers have formed alliances to help them avoid hefty European Union fines on carbon emissions by purchasing credits from electric vehicle companies.】

item.title: 云数据公司 Veeam 将以 17.3 亿美元收购 Securiti AI
item.description: Veeam 软件公司已同意以约 17.3 亿美元的价格收购数据隐私管理软件制造商 Securiti AI，以争取客户，保护和管理人工智能应用中使用的云数据。【原文：Veeam Software has agreed to buy data privacy management software maker Securiti AI for about $1.73 billion, in a bid to tap customers seeking to safeguard and manage cloud data used in artificial intelligence applications.】

item.title: 荷兰经济部长称与中国同行就芯片制造商 Nexperia 进行了交谈
item.description: 荷兰经济部长周二表示，他已就荷兰政府上月控制的荷兰计算机芯片制造商Nexperia BV公司一事与中国同行进行了沟通。Nexperia 的大部分芯片都在中国包装和销售，中国的反应是阻止出口，这让依赖其芯片的欧洲汽车制造商感到震惊。【原文：The Netherlands' Economy Minister on Tuesday said he had spoken to his Chinese counterpart about Nexperia BV, the Dutch computer chip maker the Dutch government seized control of last month. China, where most of Nexperia's chips are packaged and sold, responded by blocking exports, alarming European carmakers that rely on its chips.】

item.title: 据《图片报》报道，因芯片供应紧张，大众汽车准备停止主要车型的生产
item.description: 据《图片报》周二援引供应商行业消息人士的话报道，由于半导体供应短缺，大众汽车正准备暂停其沃尔夫斯堡工厂包括高尔夫在内的主要车型的生产。【原文：Volkswagen is preparing to suspend production of major models, including the Golf at its Wolfsburg plant, due to shortages in semiconductor supplies, Bild reported on Tuesday, citing sources in the supplier industry.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行首席财务官称第三季度财报未为苏丹相关诉讼拨备资金
item.description: 法国巴黎银行首席财务官 Lars Machenil 周二表示，法国巴黎银行在第三季度财报中没有为与苏丹有关的诉讼提取准备金。【原文：BNP Paribas PA made no provisions for Sudan-related litigation in its third-quarter results, Chief Financial Officer Lars Machenil said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Nutrien 关闭特立尼达氮肥业务
item.description: 世界顶级钾肥生产商 Nutrien 周二表示，已开始有控制地关闭其位于 Point Lisas 工厂的特立尼达氮肥业务，从 10 月 23 日起生效。【原文：World's top potash producer Nutrien said on Tuesday it has started a controlled shutdown of its Trinidad nitrogen operations at the Point Lisas facility, effective October 23.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟探索公司启动战略备选方案审查
item.description: 华纳兄弟探索公司（Warner Bros. Discovery）周二表示，在收到多方主动提出的对整个公司及其一个部门的收购意向后，该公司已开始对战略替代方案进行审查。【原文：Warner Bros. Discovery said on Tuesday it has initiated a review of strategic alternatives following unsolicited interest the company received from multiple parties for the entire company and one of its units.】

item.title: 沃勒称美联储工作人员正在研究精简 "支付账户
item.description: 一位高级官员周二表示，美国联邦储备委员会正在研究设立一个新账户，为目前依赖银行等第三方支付服务的企业提供美联储支付服务。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve is studying the creation of a new account that would provide access to Fed payment services for firms that currently rely on third parties like banks for that access, a senior official said Tuesday.】

item.title: Starboard 的 Jeff Smith 认为 TripAdvisor 应考虑出售其餐厅预订平台
item.description: Starboard Value 首席执行官杰夫-史密斯（Jeff Smith）周二表示，TripAdvisor 应考虑出售其餐厅预订平台 TheFork。【原文：Starboard Value CEO Jeff Smith said Tuesday TripAdvisor should consider selling its restaurant booking platform TheFork.】

item.title: Hologic 将在 Blackstone 和 TPG 的支持下进行高达 183 亿美元的私有化交易
item.description: Blackstone 和 TPG 周二表示，已同意以高达 183 亿美元的交易收购医疗诊断公司 Hologic，这是今年最大的医疗私有化交易之一。【原文：Blackstone and TPG have agreed to acquire medical diagnostics firm Hologic in an up to $18.3 billion deal, it said on Tuesday, marking one of the largest healthcare take-private transactions this year.】

item.title: 由于 Evolution 将竞争对手与诽谤报告联系起来，Playtech 股价暴跌
item.description: 周二，Playtech 股价下跌超过 38%，因为竞争对手 Evolution 表示将把这家英国游戏公司列入诽谤诉讼，称其一家子公司委托撰写了一份 2021 年报告，意在损害其声誉和业务运营。【原文：Playtech shares fell by more than 38% on Tuesday after rival Evolution said it would add the UK gaming firm to a defamation lawsuit, alleging one of its subsidiaries commissioned a 2021 report meant to damage its reputation and business operations.】

item.title: 沃尔玛将感恩节餐食价格降至每人 4 美元
item.description: 沃尔玛周二公布了 2025 年感恩节餐篮，人均价格低于 4 美元，这是该零售商自 2022 年推出该计划以来的最低价格，因为美国购物者正在与持续的通货膨胀和更广泛的经济不确定性作斗争。【原文：Walmart on Tuesday unveiled its 2025 Thanksgiving meal basket priced at under $4 per person, the lowest since the retailer launched the program in 2022, as U.S. shoppers contend with persistent inflation and wider economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 欧洲物流公司面临运费下降的影响
item.description: 欧洲航运和物流公司在进入第三季度财报季时面临压力，因为分析师下调了利润预测，以反映运费下降和需求疲软。【原文：European shipping and logistics firms are under pressure heading into third-quarter earnings season, as analysts trim profit forecasts to reflect falling freight rates and weaker demand.】

item.title: 荷兰监察机构警告选民不要在选举前使用人工智能聊天机器人
item.description: 荷兰数据监管机构周二警告选民不要在全国大选前使用人工智能聊天机器人，称这些平台提供的建议不可靠，会将选民推向政治光谱两端的两个主要政党。【原文：The Dutch data regulator on Tuesday warned voters against using AI chatbots ahead of the national election, saying the platforms give unreliable advice and push them towards two major parties on opposite ends of the political spectrum.】

item.title: 诺和诺德主席海尔格-隆德和其他六名董事会成员将卸任
item.description: Wegovy 制造商诺和诺德公司周二表示，公司主席海尔格-伦德（Helge Lund）和其他六名董事会成员将在 11 月 14 日即将召开的特别股东大会上卸任。【原文：Wegovy-maker Novo Nordisk said on Tuesday its Chair Helge Lund and six other board members will step down at an upcoming extraordinary general meeting on November 14.】

item.title: 福陆公司因 Starboard 收购股份而获利，敦促审查 NuScale 控股权
item.description: 周二，建筑公司福陆（Fluor Corp）的股票在盘前交易中上涨了6%，此前激进投资者Starboard Value持有该公司近5%的股份，旨在从其持有的NuScale Power公司40%的股份中释放价值，两位熟悉此事的消息人士告诉路透社。【原文：Shares of construction firm Fluor Corp rose 6% in premarket trading on Tuesday after activist investor Starboard Value took a nearly 5% stake, aiming to unlock value from its 40% holding in NuScale Power , two sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 洛克希德-马丁公司因国防需求强劲而上调 2025 年业绩预期
item.description: 周二，美国国防承包商洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin）上调了2025年的收入和利润预期，原因是在地缘政治紧张局势升级的情况下，对其战斗机和弹药的需求持续增长。【原文：U.S. defense contractor Lockheed Martin raised its 2025 forecast for revenue and profit on Tuesday, driven by sustained demand for its fighter jets and munitions amid escalating geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: Coinbase 就加密货币投资平台 Echo 签订 3.75 亿美元协议
item.description: 加密货币重量级公司 Coinbase 周二表示，它已以近 3.75 亿美元的现金加股票交易收购了投资平台 Echo，旨在为其平台带来筹款工具。【原文：Crypto heavyweight Coinbase said on Tuesday it has bought investment platform Echo in a nearly $375 million cash-and-stock deal, aiming to bring fundraising tools to its platform.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司第三季度末的积压订单额达到创纪录的 313 亿美元
item.description: 根据一份证券文件，截至第三季度末，巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）的确定订单积压达到创纪录的 313 亿美元，比去年同期增长 38%。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer's firm order backlog stood at a record $31.3 billion at the end of the third quarter, up 38% from a year earlier, according to a securities filing.】
